description: On April 13, 2020, Governor Brown announced that "Oregon had entered into a Western States Pact with the states of Washington and California, to coordinate our individual state efforts to combat COVID-19 and reopen our economies."

description: 18 May 2020, Governor of the State of Hawai'i directs all counties to obtain approval from the Governor or the Director of Hawaii Emergency Management Agency prior to issuing an emergency order, rule, or proclamation by invoking 127A-13(a)(5) of the Hawaii Revised Statutes. This is conducted by suspending 127A-14(b) and 127A-25 of the Hawaii Revised Statutes which regulate emergency declarations in Hawaii
